thread.title: Watch Emma Stone Cut Loose in Will Butler's "Anna" Video
thread.title_full: Watch Emma Stone Cut Loose in Will Butler's "Anna" Video | Maxim

author: Kelly McClure
title: Watch Emma Stone Cut Loose in Will Butler's "Anna" Video
text:
Here's a fact: If you add Emma Stone to any movie, TV show, song, or video situation, it will instantly become exponentially better. That's just the way life works.
The actress who has, in my opinion, one of the best speaking voices (second only to Lizzy Caplan ) appears in Will Butler 's video for "Anna" and tears shit up from here till Christmas.
"Anna" is off of Butler's (who you may know best from Arcade Fire ) first solo album Policy , which came out earlier this year.
